display_long_description:
#  Welcome to the Super RC (Early Access)

We’ve chosen to launch **Super RC** in Early Access so we can gather community feedback, refine the experience, and expand the roster of cars and content as development continues.

Please join our Discord (**Discord.gg/BPG**) to actively participate in the game's development and to get a chance to win free goodies!   

#  What is SUPER RC?

Unbox your car and assemble it by hand, design dream tracks with the track editor, race against opponents in multiplayer, and go wild with friends in **Sandbox Mode**. 

When you’re ready for more, hit up the **Hobby Shop** to test-drive and buy new rides.

#  Buy It.  Build It.  Drive It.

[media]

The base game includes the **Turbo Jumper**, a robust **Track Creator**, over three hours of singleplayer races and trials, sandbox mode, and up to 8-player online competitive racing.

#  Go Wild in Sandbox!

[media]

Spawn dozens of ramps, props, and obstacles to build wild obstacle courses with your friends. Test crazy ideas or create chaos — your imagination is the only limit.

#  Try Before You Buy!
[media]

Hit up the Hobby Shop to expand your RC collection with optional cars:  The GT3 for precision racing, the Short Course Truck for off-road power, and the Basher for extreme stunts.  Buy them separately over time or together for one low price with the **Founder's Pack**! 

#  The Founder's Pack!
[media]

In **Mixed Reality** define your play space, and tracks and cars auto-scale to fit, letting you race through your living room, garage, or even your backyard.

#  Eat. Sleep. Drive. Repeat!

[media]

We’ve chosen to launch **Super RC** in Early Access so we can gather community feedback, refine the experience, and expand the roster of cars and content as development continues.

Please join our Discord (**Discord.gg/BPG**) to actively participate in the game's development and to get a chance to win free goodies!   

#  What is SUPER RC?

Unbox your car and assemble it by hand, design dream tracks with the track editor, race against opponents in multiplayer, and go wild with friends in **Sandbox Mode**. 

When you’re ready for more, hit up the **Hobby Shop** to test-drive and buy new rides.

#  Buy It.  Build It.  Drive It.

The base game includes the **Turbo Jumper**, a robust **Track Creator**, over three hours of singleplayer races and trials, sandbox mode, and up to 8-player online competitive racing.

#  Go Wild in Sandbox!

Spawn dozens of ramps, props, and obstacles to build wild obstacle courses with your friends. Test crazy ideas or create chaos — your imagination is the only limit.

#  Try Before You Buy!

Hit up the Hobby Shop to expand your RC collection with optional cars:  The GT3 for precision racing, the Short Course Truck for off-road power, and the Basher for extreme stunts.  Buy them separately over time or together for one low price with the **Founder's Pack**! 

#  The Founder's Pack!

In **Mixed Reality** define your play space, and tracks and cars auto-scale to fit, letting you race through your living room, garage, or even your backyard.

#  Eat. Sleep. Drive. Repeat!
